shows.title: The Rising with Martyn Joseph
shows.desc: Festival favourite and troubadour Martyn Joseph gathers together some of the best singer-songwriters at the festival, digging into their creative mindset and craft. Collaborations, informal jamming and rare candour from great Greenbelt artists.

shows.title: Ajam
shows.desc:
Ajam is a UK-based Iranian roots music project. Drawing inspiration from the music of the streets, marketplaces and performance spaces of Iran, their sound is epic and soulful. In calling themselves Ajam they reclaim an Arabic term for Iranians which, for many, has negative connotations: by adopting it, they’re taking a positive and courageous stand against divisive attitudes.
